titleInfo.title: Hyde v. Union Pacific Railroad Company
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER ON FINAL PRETRIAL CONFERENCE - Plaintiff's 67 Motion to Strike is denied. Jury Trial is scheduled for 01/28/2008 at 9:00 AM before Judge Richard G. Kopf in Lincoln for 3 trial days. Ordered by Magistrate Judge David L. Piester. (CS, )

titleInfo.title: Hyde v. Union Pacific Railroad Company
titleInfo.subTitle: MEMORANDUM AND ORDER regarding pending motions. IT IS ORDERED: 1. Defendant's motion for summary judgment (filing 55) is denied; 2. Defendant's motion in limine (filing 75) shall be held in abeyance and not considered until the first day of trial during the pretrial conference which will be held in chambers immediately prior to trial; 3. Plaintiff's motion to supplement the record on summary judgment (filing 78) is denied as moot. Ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf. (JAB)

extension.searchTitle: USCOURTS 4:07-cv-03091; Hyde v. Union Pacific Railroad Company;
extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: MEMORANDUM AND ORDER regarding pending motions. IT IS ORDERED: 1. Defendant's motion for summary judgment (filing 55) is denied; 2. Defendant's motion in limine (filing 75) shall be held in abeyance and not considered until the first day of trial during the pretrial conference which will be held in chambers immediately prior to trial; 3. Plaintiff's motion to supplement the record on summary judgment (filing 78) is denied as moot. Ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf. (JAB)

titleInfo.title: Hyde v. Union Pacific Railroad Company
titleInfo.subTitle: SETTLEMENT ORDER. It is ordered that: (1) Within thirty (30) calendar days of the date of this order, the parties shall file a joint stipulation for dismissal (or other dispositive stipulation) with the clerk of the court (and provide a copy to the magistrate judge and to United States District Judge Richard G. Kopf, the trial judge to whom this case is assigned), together with submitting to the trial judge a draft order which will fully dispose of the case; (2) Absent compliance with this order, this case (including all counterclaims and the like) may be dismissed without further notice; (3) This case is removed from the court's January 28, 2008 trial docket upon representation by the parties that the case has settled. ***Dismissal Papers Deadline due by 2/25/2008. Ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf. (KLL, )

Ordered by Judge Richard G. Kopf. (KLL, )
